actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A bill to repeal the mandatory social security coverage of employees of religious organizations enacted by the Social Security Amendments of 1983.
short_title: Social Security Freedom of Choice Act of 1984
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Social Security Freedom of Choice Act of 1984 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code and title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to exclude from "employment" for purposes of coverage under the Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance program any service performed in the employ of a religious organization which is exempt from income tax (thus repealing the mandatory OASDI coverage of employees of religious organizations enacted by the Social Security Amendments of 1983).

titles.title: Social Security Freedom of Choice Act of 1984
A bill to repeal the mandatory social security coverage of employees of religious organizations enacted by the Social Security Amendments of 1983.
